mapper.select: select bfp.id, bfp.funding_product_id, bfp.funding_send_status, fp.product_name , fp.product_price, fp.funding_id, bfp_mp.profile_name, bfp_mp.profile_email from tbl_buy_funding_product bfp join tbl_funding_product fp on bfp.funding_product_id = fp.id join tbl_funding f on fp.funding_id = f.id and f.id = #{fundingPostId} join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile bfp_mp on bfp.member_profile_id = bfp_mp.id order by f.id desc limit #{mySettingTablePagination.startRow}, #{mySettingTablePagination.rowCount};

select count(*) from tbl_buy_funding_product bfp join tbl_funding_product fp on bfp.funding_product_id = fp.id join tbl_funding f on fp.funding_id = f.id join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id and f.id = #{fundingPostId} join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile bfp_mp on bfp.member_profile_id = bfp_mp.id

select bfp_mp.member_id, fp.funding_id, p.post_title, f.genre_type, p.created_date, p.post_content, m.profile_img_url, mp.profile_nickname,fp.product_name, fp.product_price, fl.file_name, fl.file_size, fl.file_type, fl.file_path from tbl_buy_funding_product bfp join tbl_funding_product fp on bfp.funding_product_id = fp.id join tbl_funding f on fp.funding_id = f.id join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id and p.post_type = #{postType} join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile bfp_mp on bfp.member_profile_id = bfp_mp.id join tbl_member bfp_m on bfp_mp.member_id = bfp_m.id and bfp_m.id = #{memberId} join tbl_post_file pfl on p.id = pfl.post_id join tbl_file fl on pfl.id = fl.id order by f.id desc limit #{myWorkAndFundingPagination.startRow}, #{myWorkAndFundingPagination.rowCount};

select count(*) from tbl_buy_funding_product bfp join tbl_funding_product fp on bfp.funding_product_id = fp.id join tbl_funding f on fp.funding_id = f.id join tbl_post p on f.id = p.id and p.post_type = #{postType} join tbl_member_profile mp on p.member_profile_id = mp.id join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id join tbl_member_profile bfp_mp on bfp.member_profile_id = bfp_mp.id join tbl_member bfp_m on bfp_mp.member_id = bfp_m.id and bfp_m.id = #{memberId} join tbl_post_file pfl on p.id = pfl.post_id join tbl_file fl on pfl.id = fl.id;
